name: RhymeFinder
0:
”Alexa, open Rhyme Finder.”
”Give me a rhyme for Peanut.”
”Find a three syllable near rhyme for Peanut.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rhyme finder
des:
Find perfect or near rhymes for over 550,000 words and short phrases using the powerful Datamuse word-finding engine, including syllable search!

To find a rhyme for a word, you can say "Rhyme with Example".

To get five words that rhyme with your word, you can say "Give me rhymes for Example".

To find a rhyme of a specific length, you can say "Find a three-syllable rhyme for Example".

To find a close rhyme for a word, you can say "Get a slant rhyme of Example".

After Rhyme Finder has found you a rhyme, you can say "Next" or "Forward" to hear another result. Say "Previous" or "Back" to go back.

For additional information, you can ask for help at any time by saying "Help". For help with a specific question, you can then ask Rhyme Finder a question like "Help me find near rhymes".

Thank you for using Rhyme Finder! If you felt like leaving us a review, we'd sure appreciate it!

If you have feedback or suggestions we'd love to hear from you on Twitter: @WeirdSpiritCo https://twitter.com/WeirdSpiritCo

The Datamuse API powering Rhyme Finder is a free word-finding query engine available at http://www.datamuse.com/api. The makers of Rhyme Finder, Weird Spirit, are not associated with Datamuse but extend our thanks to the Datamuse team!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
